title: Aggregate Plan
content:

Aggregate Plan 

 

 

  • Aggregate Plan 
    • Filters
    • Creating an Aggregate Plan 
    • Editing an Aggregate Plan 
    • Details View
    • Deleting an Aggregate Plan 
      • Field Description
      • Action Buttons

The aggregate plan entity will allow the user to aggregate plan values to be configured in the Plan component. 

This entity is used to view the interfaced plan values (e.g. Assortment Plan). The aggregate plan  is for a leaf product (style-color-size level).

Manager and Admin users are able to read, edit and delete records. Allocators are able to read only the records.

 

Note: The aggregate plan is applicable only for on-hand and not for PO and ASN.

 

Filters

The following is the list of filters available on this screen:

 

  1. Plan Type Id
  2. Metric Type Id
  3. Source Location Id
  4. Product Id
  5. Hierarchy Level 1
  6. Hierarchy Level 2
  7. Hierarchy Level 3

 

Creating an Aggregate Plan 

To create a new Aggregate Plan:

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > Plan Configuration > Aggregate Plan
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Click Create to view the Aggregate Plan window.
  4. Select the Plan Type Identifier from the drop-down list. This is a required field.
  5. Select the unique Metric Type Identifier from the drop-down list. This is a required field.
  6.  Enter the Original Value for the season.
  7. Enter the Adjusted Value for the season.
  8.  Select the unique Product Identifier from the drop-down list. This is a required field.
  9. Select the Source Location Identifier from the drop-down list. This is a required field.
  10. Select Hierarchy Level 1 (This field is mandatory),  Hierarchy Level 2, and  Hierarchy Level 3 from the respective drop-down lists. The number of hierarchy fields displayed here will depend on how many hierarchy levels are configured. Hierarchy Level 1 must be defined before Hierarchy Level 2 and so on.  The first hierarchy level value drop-down contains distinct entries from the corresponding field in the product entity. The next hierarchy level value drop-down contains distinct entities from the corresponding field in product entity with matching hierarchy values in the previous level. All higher hierarchy levels must be defined. 
  11. Click Save and Finish.

Editing an Aggregate Plan 

You can edit the attributes of the existing aggregate plan  records.

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > Plan Configuration > Aggregate Plan 
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Select the required plan metric record. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  4. In the Aggregate Plan window, modify the required fields.
  5. Click Save & Close to save the modified record details.

Edit View

  1. Select the required plan metric record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click Edit to view the Aggregate Plan window, and modify the required fields.
  3. Click Save & Close to save the modified record details.

Details View

 

Swipe Out List

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > Plan Configuration > Aggregate Plan 
  2. Select the required aggregate plan record. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Details.
  3. In the Aggregate Plan wizard, you can view the details of the aggregate plan metric.

Details View

  • Select the required record card and you can view the actions buttons displayed on the footer section.
  • Click Details from the action button to view details of the aggregate plan metric.

 

Deleting an Aggregate Plan 

 

The aggregate plan records can be deleted by following one of the below procedures:

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Dashboard > Aggregate Plan 
  2. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deletion of Aggregate Plan is irreversible'.

Delete

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deletion of Aggregate Plan  is irreversible'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the aggregate plan metric record.

Use the below configurations to enable the buy plan functionality.

 

POST:                                                                                                                                                   {{url}}/ai-allocation/api/ai-allocation/allocationConfig/save                                                                                              {                                                                                                                                                          "ConfigValue": "Primary",                                                                                                                                "ConfigId": "AggregateAllocationMetricHierarchyId"                                                                                                      }                                                                                                                                                       This API is used to define at which location hierarchy Id for the values are aggregated.                                                                 Note: Primary or Secondary hierarchy can be configured.

 

 

 

POST:                                                                                                                                                   {{url}}/ai-allocation/api/ai-allocation/allocationConfig/save                                                                                              {                                                                                                                                                          "ConfigValue": "locationId",                                                                                                                                "ConfigId": "AggregateAllocationMetricHierarchyLevel"                                                                                                      }                                                                                                                                                       This API is used to define at which location hierarchy levels the values are aggregated.                                                                 Note: For example, we can configure Location Id or Region or District.

 

 

 

 

POST:                                                                                                                                                   {{url}}/ai-allocation/api/ai-allocation/allocationConfig/save                                                                                               {                                                                                                                                                         "ConfigValue": "AssortmentPlan:Plan_Sales",                                                                                                               "ConfigId": "AggregateAllocationMetricPlanTypeMetricTypeId"                                                                                             }                                                                                                                                                     This API is used to configure the plan type and metric type that will be used for Buy Plan.                                                                                    
 

 

Field Description

The following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

Description
Plan Type Id The plan type identifier.
Metric Type Id The unique metric type identifier.
Original Value

The actual need value for the season.

 
Adjusted Value

The adjusted need value for the season.

This field is not mandatory. If the value is not defined, it will display the original value as default.
Product Id The unique identifier of the product.
Source Location Id The unique source location identifier.
Hierarchy Level 1 to Hierarchy Level 3 The aggregate plan metric hierarchy levels.
Export Data Loader

Allows a user to export the data on all the pages that is returned from the filter on the UI into a spreadsheet format. The Export Data Loader is asynchronous.  The system does not provide an option for the selection of fields. By default, it exports all fields from both order and order lines, and the user can view them in separate tabs.  Upon completion of the export, if configured, an alert notification can be displayed by clicking on the bell icon on the top right corner of the UI. 
Import Data Loader

Allows a user to import data from a spreadsheet into the system.  The user can use the exported spreadsheet as a template for importing new data into the system. When this import data loader button is clicked, the user is presented with a modal where they can choose the file name and the location to upload from.  Upon completion of the export, if configured, an alert notification will appear on the top right corner of the UI.

 

Action Buttons

Following are the action buttons available on the screen.

 

Select All Rows Selects all the rows of records on the screen.
Export Exports the list of aggregate plan  attributes, the file will be downloaded onto your system. View Export for more information.
Create Opens the Create Aggregate Plan  window. 
Deselect Clears the selected records.
Edit Opens the relevant Aggregate Plan window.
Delete Deletes the selected record.
